//

    ps_3_0
    def c4, 0.0625, 0, 1, 0.999000013
    def c5, 0.5, 2, -1, 1
    def c6, 0.25, 0.00039999999, -3.99959993, 0.125
    def c7, 0.699999988, 0, 0, 0
    dcl_texcoord v0.xyw
    dcl_2d s0
    dcl_2d s1
    dcl_2d s2
    dcl_2d s3
    if_ne c3.x, -c3.x
      texld r0, c4, s1
      add r0.y, -r0.y, v0.w
      mad r0.x, r0.x, r0.y, v0.x
      mov r0.yz, v0.xyww
    else
      mov r0.xyz, v0.xyww
    endif
    rcp r0.z, r0.z
    mul r0.xy, r0.z, r0
    mad r0.xy, r0, c1, c1.wzzw
    mov r0.zw, c4.y
    texldl r0, r0, s0
    mov r0.z, c4.z
    add r0.x, r0.z, -c2.y
    add r0.x, -r0.x, r0.w
    rcp r0.x, r0.x
    mul r0.x, r0.x, -c2.x
    rcp r0.y, v0.w
    mul r1.xy, r0.y, v0
    mul r1.xy, r0.x, r1
    mul r2, r1.y, c9
    mad r2, c8, r1.x, r2
    mad r2, c10, r0.x, r2
    add r2, r2, c11
    rcp r0.w, r2.w
    mul r1.zw, r0.w, r2.xyxy
    min r3.z, r2.z, c4.w
    mad r2.zw, v0.xyxy, r0.y, c4.z
    mul r2.zw, r2, c0.xyxy
    mul r2.zw, r2, c5.x
    texld r4, r2.zwzw, s3
    mad_pp r4, r4.yxyx, c5.y, c5.z
    mul_pp r5, r4.wzwz, c5.wzwz
    mad r6, r5.zwzw, c20.xxzz, r1.zwzw
    mad_pp r6, r4.zwzw, c20.yyww, r6
    mul r3.xyw, r6.xyzx, c4.zzzy
    texldl_pp r7, r3, s2
    mul r3.xyw, r6.zwzx, c4.zzzy
    texldl r6, r3, s2
    add_pp r0.y, r6.x, r7.x
    mad r5, r5, c21.xxzz, r1.zwzw
    mad_pp r4, r4, c21.yyww, r5
    mov_pp r3.xy, r4
    texldl r5, r3, s2
    add_pp r0.y, r0.y, r5.x
    mov_pp r3.xy, r4.zwzw
    texldl r4, r3, s2
    add_pp r0.y, r0.y, r4.x
    mul_pp r1.z, r0.y, c6.x
    add r1.w, -r0.y, c6.y
    add r0.y, r0.y, c6.z
    cmp r0.y, r0.y, c4.y, c4.z
    cmp r0.y, r1.w, c4.y, r0.y
    if_ne r0.y, -r0.y
      mad_pp r4, r2.xyxy, r0.w, c12
      mov_pp r3.xy, r4
      texldl_pp r5, r3, s2
      mov_pp r3.xy, r4.zwzw
      texldl r4, r3, s2
      add_pp r0.y, r4.x, r5.x
      mad_pp r4, r2.xyxy, r0.w, c13
      mov_pp r3.xy, r4
      texldl r5, r3, s2
      add_pp r0.y, r0.y, r5.x
      mov_pp r3.xy, r4.zwzw
      texldl r4, r3, s2
      add_pp r0.y, r0.y, r4.x
      mad_pp r4, r2.xyxy, r0.w, c14
      mov_pp r3.xy, r4
      texldl r5, r3, s2
      add_pp r0.y, r0.y, r5.x
      mov_pp r3.xy, r4.zwzw
      texldl r4, r3, s2
      add_pp r0.y, r0.y, r4.x
      mad_pp r2, r2.xyxy, r0.w, c15
      mov_pp r3.xy, r2
      texldl r4, r3, s2
      add_pp r0.y, r0.y, r4.x
      mov_pp r3.xy, r2.zwzw
      texldl r2, r3, s2
      add_pp r0.y, r0.y, r2.x
      mad r0.y, r0.y, c6.w, -r1.z
      mad_pp r1.z, r0.y, c7.x, r1.z
    endif
    mul r2.xyz, r1.y, c17
    mad r1.xyw, c16.xyzz, r1.x, r2.xyzz
    mad r0.xyw, c18.xyzz, r0.x, r1
    add r0.xyw, r0, c19.xyzz
    add r0.xyw, -r0, c23.xyzz
    mul r0.xyw, r0, c23.w
    dp3 r1.x, r0.xyww, r0.xyww
    rsq r1.x, r1.x
    rcp r1.y, r1.x
    mad r1.y, r1.y, c24.y, c24.z
    max r2.x, r1.y, c4.y
    mad r1.y, r2.x, -r2.x, c4.z
    max r2.x, r1.y, c4.y
    pow_pp r1.y, r2.x, c24.x
    mul r0.xyw, r0, r1.x
    dp3 r0.x, r0.xyww, -c25
    add r0.x, r0.x, -c26.x
    mul_sat r0.x, r0.x, c26.y
    mul r0.x, r0.x, r0.x
    mul_pp r0.x, r0.x, r1.y
    add r2, -r0.z, c22
    mad_pp r0, r0.x, r2, c4.z
    mul_pp r1.x, r1.z, r1.z
    mul_pp r1.x, r1.z, r1.x
    add_pp r2, -r0, c4.z
    mad_pp oC0, r1.x, r2, r0

// approximately 130 instruction slots used (28 texture, 102 arithmetic)
